name: CodeBreakers (Nycelly, ULion)
description:
In this juicy, turn-based rhythm game, play as soldiers known as CodeBreakers whose job is to squash bugs in the CyberSpace! Fight in the beat of the music, and strategize how to exterminate these nasty pests in CodeBreakers!

Controls

Arrow Keys: UI Navigation

Spacebar: Action

Credits

ULion: Programming, Game Design

Nycelly: Music, Audio, Art, Programming

Extra Help:

Glumnior: Narrative, Playtesting, Game Design

Belp: Art, Playtesting

Changelog
  • 1.0.1 (Dec 2, 2021): Bug fixes, and game balancing.
  • 1.0.0 (Dec 1, 2021): Published game
